section.heading: Security interest unperfected before applicability date.
section.text: A security interest that is an unperfected security interest immediately before the applicability date becomes a perfected security interest:

para.text: Without further action, on the applicability date, if the applicable requirements for perfection under Article 9 as amended by the 2012 Act are satisfied before or at that time; or
When the applicable requirements for perfection are satisfied if the requirements are satisfied after that time.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 19-302: Section 4 of D.C. Law 19-302 provided that the act shall apply as of July 1, 2013.
